pkgmetadata.longdescription: Makes 'R' Easier for Everyone // A meta-package that aims to make 'R' easier for everyone, especially programmers who have a background in 'SAS' software. This set of packages brings many useful concepts to 'R', including data libraries, data dictionaries, formats and format catalogs, a data step, and a traceable log. The system also includes a package that replicates several commonly-used 'SAS' procedures, like 'PROC FREQ', 'PROC MEANS', and 'PROC REG'.
